title: Base Ball trade cards for sale
author: aelefson

posts.post_title: Base Ball trade cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Hi-

I have for sale the scrapbook page shown below with 6 1800s era trade cards.  Each one advertises a store run by A R Fisher and the cards state they sell rubber balls, base balls, and bats.  I believe these are from Rhode Island as the back has several Newport RI trade cards.  Please let me know if you need better pictures, are interested, or have any questions.  The price is 100.00 delivered.

Alan

I will try selling these for 75.00 shipped.  Please let me know if you are interested.

Alan
